level.text: Individual tenants involved in any proceeding shall be individually identified.

Any tenant association may file and shall be granted party status to prosecute or defend a petition on behalf of any one or more of its members who have provided the association with written authorization to represent them in the action, or to seek on behalf of all members and any injunctive relief available under the Rental Housing Act of 1985, effective July 17, 1985 (D.C. Law 6-10; D.C. Official Code ยง 42-3501.01 set seq.). No further inquiry into the membership of the association shall be permitted.
Any tenant association that is a party to the action pursuant to ยง 3904.2 shall be listed in the caption.
